name: Aṣẹ Artisanal
description: Unique, handcrafted items such as pottery, textiles, and wood carvings that reflect the rich artistic traditions of the Yoruba people.

name: Adé Apparel
description: Tailored kaftans, elevated Ankara sets, and modern statement pieces designed for intentional, confident style.

name: Ori Attars
description: Bold concentrated oud fragrance oils blended with spice woods, resins, and botanical notes sourced from Dubai.

name: AKU Wellness
description: A curated collection of botanical tonic bitters, artisanal body butters, soaps, and wellness essentials. Crafted for rejuvenation, healing, and functional elegance.

name: Ṣepọ Stride
description: Authenticated sneakers, luxury heels, and statement boots. Selected for condition, rarity, and cultural flavor.

name: Iru Accessories
description: Handcrafted jewelry, scarves, and bags inspired by Yoruba traditions. Each piece tells a story of heritage, artistry, and cultural pride.
